item.title: Matthew add a quote by Martin Amis
item.description: "Life is made of fear. Some people eat fear soup three times a day. Some people eat fear soup all the meals there are. I eat it sometimes. When they bring me fear soup to eat, I try not to eat it, I try to send it back. But sometimes I'm too afraid to and have to eat it anyway." -- Martin Amis

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "Life got in the way -- two years in the army, work, marriage, family responsibilities, the need to earn more and more money, all the muck that bogs us down when we don't have the balls to stand up for ourselves -- but I had never lost my interest in books." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Roberto Bolaño
item.description: "In some lost fold of the past, we wanted to be lions and we're no more than castrated cats" -- Roberto Bolaño

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "There was only one road back to L.A. - U.S. Interstate 15. Just a flat-out high speed burn through Baker and Barstow and Berdoo. Then onto the Hollywood Freeway, and straight on into frantic oblivion. Safety. Obscurity." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Graham Greene
item.description: "You cannot conceive, nor can I, of the appalling strangeness of the mercy of God." -- Graham Greene

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Guy Debord
item.description: "Young people everywhere have been allowed to choose between love and a garbage disposal unit. Everywhere they have chosen the garbage disposal unit." -- Guy Debord

item.title: Matthew add a quote by Tanu Reshma B Singh
item.description: "The subconscious n conscious mind together comprise functional brain which operates 24 hours a day as a kind of computer, selecting and registering data n then feeding it back when need it." -- Tanu Reshma B Singh
